actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide relief from shore damages attributable to high water levels in the Great Lakes, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to investigate, study, and undertake remedial measures for the prevention or mitigation of shore damages attributable to high water levels in one or more of the Great Lakes.

titles.title: A bill to provide relief from shore damages attributable to high water levels in the Great Lakes, and for other purposes.
